long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🏆Best tool made for people who want to download Facebook comments.

A brilliant comments export tool that allows you to quickly export Facebook comments with just one click!

🖖  KEY FEATURES:

Download FB comments with one click.

🚗 DESCRIPTION Step by Step:

1.Click the export button.

⛵️ SUPPORTED COLUMNS:

Comment id
User id 
Username
Avatar Url
Content
Post Url
Reaction Count
Depth
Extracted At

🔎  HOW DOES IT WORK:

Using Facebook's official API to export data.
Free user can export the first 50 records.
Paid users can export without limits. Only $4.99!

🔒  USAGE POLICY

No password required.
All the data you export is processed locally, so no one knows what you download.
